item.title: By: Chris Blatnick
item.dc:creator: Chris Blatnick
item.description: <p>Hmmm...great minds! I've had a conversation or two with some guys about this same idea. Will anxiously be watching. Best of luck to you guys. I have no doubt you will exceed your goals!!! </p>
item.content:encoded: Hmmm…great minds! I’ve had a conversation or two with some guys about this same idea. Will anxiously be watching. Best of luck to you guys. I have no doubt you will exceed your goals!!!

item.title: By: Vitor Pereira
item.dc:creator: Vitor Pereira
item.description: <p>Well done guys.<br /><br />Will you franchise? I could easily see a Lisbon Co-op coming up. </p>
item.content:encoded:
Well done guys.

Will you franchise? I could easily see a Lisbon Co-op coming up.

item.title: By: Richard Schwartz
item.dc:creator: Richard Schwartz
item.description: <p>Congrats! Much the same as what I helped start more than a dozen years ago with Penumbra Group. I've moved on, but they're still going strong.<br /></p>
item.content:encoded: Congrats! Much the same as what I helped start more than a dozen years ago with Penumbra Group. I’ve moved on, but they’re still going strong.
